typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitCost as float,
		LineNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CloudSalesOrderDetails
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as date,
		ShipDate as date,
		TotalCost as float,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CloudSalesOrder
CloudSalesOrder select(mapColumn(
		OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		OrderDate,
		ShipDate,
		TotalCost,
		OrderCreatedDate = CreatedDate,
		OrderUpdatedDate = UpdatedDate
	)) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns derive(SourceSystemID = 'SouthridgeCloudSales') ~> CreateRecordIDs
CloudSalesOrderDetails select(mapColumn(
		OrderDetailID,
		OrderID,
		MovieID,
		Quantity,
		UnitCost,
		LineNumber,
		OrderDetailCreatedDate = CreatedDate,
		OrderDetailUpdatedDate = UpdatedDate
	)) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns derive(SourceSystemID = 'SouthridgeCloudSales') ~> AddingSourceTableName
CreateRecordIDs sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[''],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SouthridgeSalesOrders
